QuestData.Title: The Threat of Flame
QuestData.Description: Flame has threatened me for far too long... far too long... but it is no longer the little ones, no longer mere gnats...$B$BThe fields burn! The hills and highlands scream, $r, they scream. The elementals brought here consume all life in their wake.$B$BThey cannot stand, they cannot stand. Stop them. STOP THEM! Destroy the bringers of flame...
QuestData.RewardText: Yes... the flames die. There is peace now. Peace for the land.
